instruction: Generate a conversation between a customer and a tech support representative about resetting a password.
input: Customer: I need to reset my password.
output:
Customer: I need to reset my password.

Tech Support Representative: No problem! What is the email address you use to login to your account? 

Customer: It's example@example.com 

Tech Support Representative: Great. Please give me one moment while I look up your account so that I can reset the password. 

[tech support searches for account, resets password]

Tech Support Representative: Okay, I was able to reset your password for your account. Your new password is [redacted]. Please use this password to login to your account. Do you have any other questions? 

Customer: No, that's it. Thank you for your help. 

Tech Support Representative: You're welcome! Have a great rest of your day.
